verbs.description: misreckon (third-person singular simple present misreckons, present participle misreckoning, simple past and past participle misreckoned)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To add (something) up incorrectly, make a wrong calculation of (an amount etc.).
(reflexive, obsolete) To make a wrong calculation, to be in error.
examples: And therefore he that hath once misreckoned himselfe is never seene againe.
